title: Carl Bildt – 2022 Statement on Russian Attack on Ukrainian Civilians
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Carl Bildt, the Co-Chair European Council on Foreign Relations, on Twitter on 10 October 2022.
content: It looks as if Russia is randomly attacking the city center of Kyiv. Two immediate consequences: a new wave of refugees and a new discussion on air defence for Kyiv and Ukraine.
